flawed_nl_solution:
If Lori has 15 times as many beanie babies as Sydney, Sydney has 300/15 = 20 beanie babies.
Together, they have 20 + 300 = <<20+300=302>>302 beanie babies
#### 302

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 320, not 302. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
